title: How Startups Are Transforming the Smart City Movement
text:
02 How Startups Are Transforming the Smart City Movement 
Government Technology: Remember the 1990s visions of the future? Those first incantations of the sweeping “smart city,” so technologically utopian and Tomorrowland-ish in design? The concept and solutions were pitched by tech titans like IBM and Cisco, cost obscene amounts of money, and promised equally outlandish levels of innovation.
